mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_file_resource( objId, type, typeDesc, url, sort, createDate ) SELECT #{objId}, #{type}, #{typeDesc}, #{url}, #{sort}, NOW() FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id FROM t_file_resource WHERE objId = #{objId} AND `type` != #{type} and url = #{url})
mapper.select: SELECT t.`type`, t.`typeDesc`, count(f.id) AS typeCount, ( SELECT count(1) FROM t_file_resource ) AS sumCount FROM t_file_type t LEFT JOIN t_file_resource f ON f.type = t.type GROUP BY t.`type` ORDER BY t.type
mapper.delete: delete from t_file_resource where id in #{item}
